about_the_game:
Wilderness: Survival is a single or multiplayer survival game. "Mythic Craft Studios" is a production that aims to offer players a unique pirate-themed survival experience. In this game played in multiplayer or single mode in low poly graphic style. It is a pirate-like game where you can, build bases, produce weapons, try to survive by fishing, hunting, farming, finding food and fighting various gangs. In this game full of a rich world, dynamic battles and elements of strategic base building, development and conflict with other players, players will write their own stories and embark on a great adventure.

"Our game is still in development, and our team consists of only three people. We are constantly working to improve the quality based on your feedback. We closely monitor your comments hour by hour and shape the game according to your input. With your support, we aim to make our game even better."
